= Details =

Класс для определения по диффу папки с задачей, что является тестами

class DiffTestFinder:
    def __init__(self, mask=None, exclude=None) #mask and exclude is a string
    def tests(self, diff, stdout=None): #diff is a list of files, stdout - file of redirected stdout of generator, returns names of test files
        if exclude defined:
	    diff = diff / <set of files, which matchs exclude>
        if mask defined:
            diff = diff / <set of files, which not matchs mask>
        if diff is empty:
            return [stdout]
        else:
            return diff
